programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Ben the rat returns to lead a violent rodent army in this 1972 horror sequel to "Willard."

programme.title: Slaughterhouse Rock
programme.desc: A college student visits Alcatraz with his friends after having recurring nightmares of a rock band that was killed there.

programme.title: Q: The Winged Serpent
programme.desc: Its name is Quetzalcoatl, a dragon-like Aztec god that is summoned to modern-day Manhattan by a mysterious cult.

programme.title: Dark Stories
programme.desc: When Christine is attacked by a bloodthirsty creepy doll, she has to use all her imagination to distract it with horror stories.

programme.title: And Now The Screaming Starts!
programme.desc: A young bride to be becomes the victim of her fiance's family's curse.

programme.title: Howling IV: The Original Nightmare
programme.desc: A successful author moves to a small town after suffering a mental breakdown and is tormented by demons and werewolves.

programme.title: The Ninth Configuration
programme.desc: A military psychiatrist takes charge of an army mental hospital situated in a secluded castle filled with eccentric patients.

programme.title: Exorcism [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: A young woman participates (unknowingly) in a satanic ceremony and gets possessed by the spirit of her late father.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Satanic Rites Of Dracula
programme.desc: Elvira decides that the film she's hosting is so boring that she catches up on her reading and various personal chores.

programme.title: Scanners II: The New Order
programme.desc: A breed of humans with dangerously powerful telepathic abilities are recruited by a corrupt police commander.

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera (1925)
programme.desc: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Doomsday Machine
programme.desc: When a Chinese plot to destroy the Earth is uncovered, the U.S. teams up with the Soviet Union to replace members of its all-male crew with women.

programme.title: Devil's Playground (2010)
programme.desc: As the world succumbs to a zombie apocalypse, a hardened mercenary chases someone who can provide a cure.

programme.title: The Devil's Rain
programme.desc: A satanist cult leader is burnt alive by the local church. He vows to come back to hunt down and enslave every descendant of his congregation.
